author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Caribbean Airlines Flight BW526
text:
Caribbean Airlines Flight BW526 Published on : Friday, July 31, 2015
Caribbean Airlines advises that on July 29, 2015 an incident occurred as its flight BW 526 destined for JFK, New York was about to take off from Piarco International Airport, Trinidad.
As power was applied to initiate take off roll, an abnormal sound was heard. The cockpit crew initiated all appropriate procedures and reported the incident.
The aircraft was safely repositioned to the gate, where passengers and crew disembarked. Arrangements are being made for the onward travel of all passengers later this evening.
The aircraft has been withdrawn from service and all appropriate inspections and procedures are in progress.
Caribbean Airlines apologises for any inconvenience caused and assures its customers that the safety of its passengers and crew is the airlineâ€™s number one priority.
Source:- Caribbean Airlines
